title: Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham
text:
Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham is a multi-disciplinary, world-class university in India, founded by Sri Mata Amritanandamayi Devi (Amma). With its headquarters at Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, the university has campuses across the country, including Coimbatore, Bengaluru, Amritapuri, Amaravati Chennai, Kochi, Mysuru, Nagercoil and Faridabad. Known for its commitment to academic excellence and social responsibility, Amrita offers a wide range of programs across engineering, medicine, Ayurveda, business, Biotechnology, agriculture, architecture, nanotechnology, arts, humanities, mass communication, social sciences, and emerging technologies.
Ranked 7th in the University category by NIRF 2024 Amrita is distinguished for its research output, industry collaborations, and global outlook. It emphasizes sustainable development, compassionate values, and research-driven education that addresses real-world challenges. With partnerships with over 200 universities worldwide, Amrita facilitates global learning opportunities, student exchange programs, and collaborative research.
The institution’s ethos of integrating scientific knowledge with spiritual wisdom makes it a unique hub for holistic education. Its focus on innovative research in fields like healthcare, AI, data science, and environmental sciences aligns with its vision of contributing to the well-being of society.
Amrita’s commitment to humanitarian service, inspired by Amma’s teachings, ensures that students graduate not just as professionals but also as responsible citizens with a mindset to serve society.
